articles.title: Price at the pump hits record 167.64p for petrol and 180.88p for diesel - Daily Mail
articles.description: The previous record of 167.3p for petrol was set on March 22, the day before a 5p cut in fuel duty was implemented by Chancellor Rishi Sunak.
articles.content:
Fuel prices have soared to their highest levels ever of 167.64p for petrol and 180.88p for diesel - causing yet more misery for drivers amid the cost of living crisis.
